products.shortDescription: Best Buy Protection enhances the coverage of your manufacturer’s warranty and gives you extended coverage after your manufacturer’s warranty ends. During the coverage period, if your product has a covered failure that doesn’t fall under the manufacturer warranty, Best Buy will provide you with a repair, replacement or store credit.
